import React, { useContext ,useState} from 'react' import noteContext from '../context/noteContext' let AddNote = () => { const context = useContext(noteContext) const{addnote}=context const [note, setNote] = useState({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) const handleclick = (e)=>{ // e.preventDefault(); addnote(note.title,note.description,note.tag) } const onchange = (e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (

Add a Note


Title must be 5 characters long

Descripation must be 5 characters long
) } export default AddNote
